message: This is where you will be making your choices to stay alive in a pandemic.
You will be presented with a choice from a character each day.
Drag the card in the middle to see your choices and swipe all the way to the left or right to pick one.
Your choices will affect your status bars (Physical Health, Mental Health, Wealth, Supplies) at the top.
You can also use your items from the inventory to increase your resources if they are highlighted
Surivive as long as possible. Good luck!
